rsdl.description: This Webservice implements 4 basic arthemetic operations i.e., addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Each of these 4 operations takes in two parameters as input from the user. These parameters are num1 and num2, which represent the two numbers on which operation is to be performed. These inputs may be given as integers or floating point numbers. The API services i.e., addition,subtraction, multiplication and division offered by this app are accessible at /api/add, /api/sub, /api/mul and /api/div respectively. Each of them takes the input values as GET parameters and will yield a JSON-formatted dictionary result containing the result of the operation over the two input numbers.
